text: <extra_id_0> TLR4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA Increased in Brain Tissue after ICH
<extra_id_0> TLR4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA levels were detected by Rt-PCR .
The low level of <extra_id_0> TLR4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA was observed in normal rat brain tissue .
In the saline control group , the <extra_id_0> TLR4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA slightly increased , but was not significantly different from normal group .

However , the <extra_id_0> TLR4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA after ICH significantly increased starting from 6 hours after ICH ( P < .05 ) , peaked on the 3rd day after ICH , and then decreased on the 7th day after ICH ( P < .05 ) , but still maintained a higher level compared with saline control ( P < .05 , Figure 1 ) .
